text: Roberto Falaschi (9 June 1931 - 30 May 2009) was an Italian professional racing cyclist. He rode in five editions of the Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Tuscany Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Roberto Falaschi
